amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 118-142 to strike section 1224 of the bill, which extends lend-lease authority to Ukraine.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 1224 of the bill, which extends lend-lease authority to Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 71 - 360 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Ogles.
